metadata.title: Felgenland Saga Stellar Regions
metadata.description: Diplomatic division of human space post-Union Directorate War (2353-2356), per the Treaty of Dual Spheres (2357) signed on Earth, dividing space between the Terran Directorate and the Allies (Felgenland Union, Protelani Republic, Dorsai Republic), with neutral frontier zones and the Free Democracy of Terminus (Mars).
metadata.coordinate_system: Galactic coordinates (ra in degrees, dec in degrees, distance in light-years)

regions.name: Allied Union Core Quadrant
regions.description: Core of the Felgenland Union, centered on Holsten Tor (20 LMi A&B, Stahlburgh and Eisenwald), Brandenburgh Tor (Hansaburgh), Greifen Tor (Lochiel), and Tiefe-Grenze Tor (Brandstadt). Hosts MacCarthy Limited shipyards and Campbell Industries exosuits. Part of the Felgenland Free Trade Zone.
regions.significance: Union’s capital region, producing Falke-VI interceptors and SternHammer Cannons, linked by Holsten-Brandenburg and Griefen-Tiefe Routes.

sectors.name: Holsten Sector
sectors.description: Capital system with Stahlburgh (20 LMi A) and Eisenwald moon (20 LMi B), relay hub for Quantum Entanglement Communicators, ~200 million.

sectors.name: Brandenburg Sector
sectors.description: Hansaburgh, helium-3 mining from gas giant, major manufacturing center, ~150 million.

sectors.name: Greifen Sector
sectors.description: Lochiel, core Union territory, supplies rare metals (titanium, lithium), ~150 million.

sectors.name: Brandstadt Sector
sectors.description: Core Union world, Brandstadt, exports food and metals to Protelan Trade Corridor, ~100 million.

regions.name: Allied Union Rim Quadrant
regions.description: Rimward Union territory, including colonial worlds like Heatherly and Gliese 876. Part of the Felgenland Free Trade Zone, supporting logistics and trade.
regions.significance: Frontier expansion with Heatherly and Gliese 876, linked by Protelan-Brandenburg Express and Protelan Trade Corridor.

sectors.name: Heatherly Sector
sectors.description: Union colonial world, Heatherly, in Ursa Major, near Holsten Tor, ~30 million.

sectors.name: Gliese 876 Sector
sectors.description: Union logistics hub, Gliese 876 d in habitable zone, supports Protelan Trade Corridor, ~5 million.

regions.name: Directorate Core Quadrant
regions.description: Core of the Terran Directorate, centered on Sol (Earth) and Alpha Centauri. Treaty of Dual Spheres signed on Earth for Byzantine psychological advantage. Part of the Terran Core Economic Zone.
regions.significance: Directorate’s political and industrial core, linked by Earth-Centauri Express. Poised for treaty violations targeting neutral frontiers.

sectors.name: Sol Sector
sectors.description: Earth, Directorate’s heart and treaty signing site, ~50 billion.

sectors.name: Centauri Sector
sectors.description: Oldest Directorate colony, key administrative hub, ~500 million.

regions.name: Directorate Rim Quadrant
regions.description: Rimward Directorate territory, including Sirius and Proxima Centauri, claimed to prevent Allied encirclement. Part of the Terran Core Economic Zone.
regions.significance: Strategic systems to maintain open corridors, linked by Earth-Proxima Supply Chain. Flashpoint for expansion into neutral frontiers.

sectors.name: Sirius Sector
sectors.description: Key Directorate industrial hub, ~1 billion.

sectors.name: Proxima Sector
sectors.description: Frontier colony under Directorate control, ~500 million.

regions.name: Neutral Spinward Frontier
regions.description: Neutral frontier zone with independent systems like Wolf 359, Pentothia Prime (GJ 380), and Gliese 581. Hosts reptilian traders and research outposts, linked to Protelan Trade Corridor. Vulnerable to Directorate incursions.
regions.significance: Demilitarized trade and research hub, open to Allies and Directorate, contested by both.

sectors.name: Wolf Sector
sectors.description: Neutral system with research stations and independent settlements, ~30 million.

sectors.name: Pentothian Sector
sectors.description: Pentothia Prime, capital of the Pentothian Trade Conglomerate, reptilian traders in a temperate Virgo biome, ~50 million.

sectors.name: Gliese 581 Sector
sectors.description: Neutral research colony, hosts Gliese 581 c and d in habitable zone, ~10 million.

regions.name: Neutral Anti-Spinward Frontier
regions.description: Sparse neutral frontier with systems like Ross 248 and Tau Ceti (Cetan Confederacy). Open to Allies and Directorate, but targeted by Directorate ambitions post-2357.
regions.significance: Neutral zone with independent systems, contested by Directorate for expansion.

sectors.name: Ross 248 Sector
sectors.description: Isolated neutral system with research stations, potential Directorate target, ~20 million.

sectors.name: Cetan Sector
sectors.description: Cetan Confederacy, independent post-2356, hosts Asimov and Heinlein, trade hub, ~35 million.

regions.name: Allied Spinward Quadrant
regions.description: Allied region led by the Protelani Republic on Protelan (moon orbiting Grandpere, 61 Ursae Majoris), a Dubai-like trade hub for torch drive commerce. Part of the Felgenland Free Trade Zone, linked to neutral frontiers.
regions.significance: Protelani Republic’s chic trade hub, linked by Protelan Trade Corridor and Pentothian-Protelan Trade Route.

sectors.name: Protelan Sector
sectors.description: Protelani Republic’s trade hub, Protelan (moon orbiting Grandpere), allied with the Union, ~36 million.

regions.name: Allied Anti-Spinward Quadrant
regions.description: Allied frontier region with Dorsai Republic systems on Fomalhaut (Valorgraemo), providing elite military support with Campbell Industries exosuits. Part of the Felgenland Free Trade Zone.
regions.significance: Dorsai Republic’s military stronghold, linked by Dorsai-Felgenland Military Alliance Route, supports neutral frontier defense.

sectors.name: Dorsai Sector
sectors.description: Dorsai Republic’s Citadel of Valoro, training elite soldiers, ~80 million.

regions.name: Terminus Quadrant
regions.description: Independent region centered on Mars, the Free Democracy of Terminus, founded with Elon Musk and Grok’s influence, maintaining autonomy post-war.
regions.significance: Neutral, independent Mars, a symbol of autonomy, linked to Protelan Trade Corridor.

sectors.name: Terminus Sector
sectors.description: Free Democracy of Terminus, independent Mars, founded with Elon Musk and Grok’s vision, ~500 million.

regions.name: Anti-Driftward Frontier
regions.description: Neutral frontier zone below the galactic plane, centered on L 98-59, a former Directorate stronghold. Hosts Fortress Echelon, site of the Battle of Foxtrot (2353). Open to Allies and Directorate, contested post-2357.
regions.significance: Contested neutral zone with Directorate and Union interests, linked to Protelan Trade Corridor. Vulnerable to Directorate treaty violations.

sectors.name: L 98-59 Sector
sectors.description: Former Directorate stronghold, Fortress Echelon, site of Battle of Foxtrot (2353), now neutral, ~15 million.

sectors.name: Gliese 667 Sector
sectors.description: Neutral outpost, hosts Gliese 667 Cc in habitable zone, reconnaissance hub, ~10 million.

sectors.name: HD 69830 Sector
sectors.description: Independent research colony, hosts Neptune-mass planets with habitable moons, ~20 million.

regions.name: Trailing Frontier
regions.description: Neutral frontier zone with sparse mining outposts like Eta Cassiopeiae and 82 G. Eridani. Supplies resources to Protelan Trade Corridor, open to both Allies and Directorate, neutral post-2357.
regions.significance: Neutral mining frontier, supports trade routes, contested by both sides but stabilized by Treaty of Dual Spheres.

sectors.name: Eta Cassiopeiae Sector
sectors.description: Neutral mining colony, supplies metals to Protelan Trade Corridor, ~10 million.

sectors.name: 82 G. Eridani Sector
sectors.description: Neutral industrial colony, hosts super-Earths, supports Union and Directorate trade, ~15 million.
